description: Create a portfolio planning document and provide services as required
tags: Business Consulting, Specialist added with new Legal Team -- Issue

full_summary:
### Portfolio Planner for Real Property
#### Request for Proposal
{: .title }

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01030121
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-15
* **Closing Date:** 2023-04-04T12:00:00
* **Contract Type:** Services contract for Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Postal Address:** 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0C5, Canada
* **Country:** Canada

#### Description of the Work
A consultant specialized in Portfolio Planning is needed to assist in developing an organizational playbook document to identify the Owner Investor Group's mandate, key functions, and areas of responsibility. The Consultant will also provide Portfolio Planning, Process Mapping, Policy development, and Information and Asset Organizing services on an "as required" basis.

#### Specifications
* The contract period will be from contract award to March 31, 2026.
* The Consultant must have Level 3 expertise in Portfolio Planning for Real Property.
* Specialized skills and experience in human resource services, business consulting/change management, and project management are essential.
* The Consultant must be willing to work on "as required" basis.

#### Preference
Only TSPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region are eligible to bid on this requirement.

#### Trade Agreements
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites eligible bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS) for the required Portfolio Planner for Real Property.

#### Contact Information
Inquiries about this Request for Proposal must be directed to Rhonda DiMarco, Contracting Authority, at rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca. The Solicitation Document will be sent directly to the eligible bidders.

#### Closing Date
The closing date for the submission of proposals is April 4, 2023 at 12:00 P.M. EDT. The proposal must be submitted electronically.

**: .stressm notification **ONLY**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language. ** ALL EMERGENCY PRO
